use.flag: Build support for Adium-style HTML-based conversation window themes using net-libs/webkit-gtk

pkgmetadata.longdescription: Empathy consists of a rich set of reusable instant messaging widgets, and a GNOME client using those widgets. It uses Telepathy and Nokia's Mission Control, and reuses Gossip's UI. The main goal is to permit desktop integration by providing libempathy and libempathy-gtk libraries. libempathy-gtk is a set of powerful widgets that can be embeded into any GNOME application. A client application is provided.
